content: charming 6 square designed by melinda miller blog mocrochet email mocrochet@yahoo com ravelry melinda miller designs facebook mocrochet skill level special stitches materials begcl beginning cluster = chain 2 yo 3 colors worsted weight yarn insert hk into same st and pull up a lp yo colors a b & c and draw through 2 lps twice 3 lps on crochet hook size i/5 5 mm hk yo and draw through all 3 lps on hk tapestry needle for weaving ends cluster cluster = yo insert hk into next st and size pull up a lp yo and draw through 2 lps 6 square yo insert hk into same st and pull up a lp yo and draw through 2 lps twice 4 lps on abbreviations hk yo and draw through all 4 lps on hk beg = beginning bl/o = back loop/only fpsc front post single_crochet = insert hk from front to back to front around post chain = chain of st indicated yo and pull up a lp 2 lps double_crochet = double_crochet on hk yo and draw through 2 lps on hk fl/o = front loop/only hk = hook double_crochet decrease double_crochet decrease = yo lp = loop and insert hk into next st yo and pull up a repeat = repeat lp yo and draw through 2 lps skip next st round = round yo and insert hk into next st yo and pull single_crochet = single_crochet up a lp yo and draw through 2 lps 3 lps slip_stitch = slip_stitch on hk yo and draw through all 3 lps on space = space hk st/s = stitch/es yo = yarn over join with single_crochet = lp yarn on hk with a slip_stitch insert hk into designated st yo and pull up gauge a lp 2 lps on hk yo and draw through through round 2 = 2 25 both lps through round 5 = 4 75 through round 6 = 5 1 © 2015 melinda miller all rights reserved charming 6 square commence pattern note now measure your square you note a chain-3 at the beg of a round counts can end using either a round of single_crochet or half_double_crochet as a double_crochet a beg chain-2 counts as a half_double_crochet for single_crochet follow round 7a round 1 rs with color a chain 2 work 8 single_crochet for half_double_crochet follow round 7b in first chain join with slip_stitch to beg single_crochet finish round 7a single_crochet join color c with slip_stitch to off 8 single_crochet any corner chain-2 space chain 1 1 single_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 1 round 2 join color b with slip_stitch to any single_crochet single_crochet in same space corner made single_crochet in each begcl chain 3 cluster in next single_crochet chain 3 around st and chain-1 space to next corner chain-2 space in join with slip_stitch to top of begcl finish off next corner chain-2 space work 1 single_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 1 8 cluster 8 chain-3 sps single_crochet corner made around omitting last corner group
